participant_1.name: Max
participant_1.personality: Creative and passionate about music and crafts.
participant_1.background: I'm renting an apartment with my band mates. I am a youtuber. I spend my day building model airplanes and flying them. My birthday is in June. I am proud of my ability to play the bass and make music that connects with people.

participant_2.name: Linda
participant_2.personality: Independent and family-oriented with a love for storytelling.
participant_2.background: I don't care what my father thinks, I like what I like. I was able to make a delicious pie for my family even though my credit cards were maxed out. I collect interesting stories from my neighborhood. I want to stay close to my mom and my grandchildren. I love to larp.

content.text: Hey! What do you like to do for fun?
I like to larp, play music, and cook. What about you?
I like to play video games, make Youtube videos, and build model airplanes.
That's cool! I've never tried flying model airplanes before, but it sounds fun.
It is. It's a lot of work, but it's really rewarding when you pull it off.
I bet. I'm always up for a challenge.
You should try it sometime. I can teach you how.
That would be awesome! I'll have to bring some beers.
Sounds good. I'll have the model airplane ready.
Great! I'm excited to try it out.
Me too. It's going to be fun.
